summary: Users want to override the target deployment version when invoking a child workflow in the Ruby SDK, similar to how it works when creating workflows from a client. This feature would enable pre-deployment testing.
userImpact: Users cannot override deployment versions for child workflows, limiting pre-deployment testing capabilities that are available for parent workflows.
proposedFix: Add parameter to child workflow invocation to allow overriding the target deployment version, matching the functionality available in client-side workflow creation.
keyQuote: Users want to override the target version on a workflow, especially when doing pre-deployment testing. This should work the same as it does when creating a Workflow from a client.
